label: Guarantee
comment: An official promise or assurance to fulfil a financial obligation.

datatypeProperties.comment: A condition or status, expressed as text, for this process characteristic.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.

objectProperties.comment: The period within which this financial guarantee is effective.
The monetary value of the liability in this financial guarantee.

referencedBy.comment: The financial guarantee identified for this payment trade settlement.
